details:
verb
- communicate or express by writing
= example: communicate or express by writing
- record data on a computer
= synonyms: save
- the act of composing a text
= example: the act of composing a text
= synonyms: drop a line
- communicate by letter
- mark or trace on a surface
- create code, write a computer program
= example: create code, write a computer program
- produce a literary work
= synonyms: pen
- write or name the letters that comprise the conventionally accepted form of (a word or part of a word)
= synonyms: spell
- write music
= synonyms: compose
- have (one's written work) issued for publication
= example: have (one's written work) issued for publication
= synonyms: publish
